properties.name: ItemClass
properties.comment: This is the item class to filter out.

properties.name: OutputIndex
properties.comment: Which output to send this to.

name: AFGBuildableSplitterSmart
comment: A smart splitter which you can tell where stuff should go!

methods.name: GetNumSortRules
methods.comment: Get the number of sort rules this splitter has.

methods.name: GetMaxNumSortRules
methods.comment: Get number of max sort rules.

methods.name: IsValidSortRuleAt
methods.comment: Is this a valid sort rule index

methods.name: GetSortRuleAt
methods.comment: Get the number of sort rules this splitter has.

methods.name: RemoveSortRuleAt
methods.comment: Removes the rule at passed index.

methods.name: SetSortRuleAt
methods.comment: Updates the sort rule at the passed index.

methods.name: GetAllOutputConnectionsForItem
methods.comment: Returns all connections that this item could be placed onto. It excludes wildcard outputs if there is a rule specifically set for this item type

properties.name: mSortRules
properties.comment: These are the sorting rules the player has entered.

properties.name: mMaxNumSortRules
properties.comment: How many rules this splitter can have.
